name: Hermit Castle
description:
Play as a hermit crab as you explore the remains of a forgotten underwater palace.  Equip different shells to overcome various trials and avoid dangerous creatures.  Find the ghost of each of the forgotten souls to break the castle of its curse and set its forgotten souls free.

Made for the PIGSquad 2021 "Exploration" Summer Slow Jam with the theme of "Forgotten Places."

Credits
Coding: Merlin Benneth
Artwork: Emma Price
Music: Jeff "Surreal" Cline

Controls:
Arrow Keys - Move
Z - Jump
X - Perform shell action
Note:  Gamepad support is included, but has not been tested.  In-game prompts will also not reflect gamepad controls.

Esc - Pause/View map (Q/R while paused quits/restarts game)
F - Switch to fullscreen (Note: Switching back from fullscreen is buggy)
1-6 keys - Change game screen size
F10 - Reduce ghost count by 1 (Cheat code; Included for debug purposes)
